name: data_dir
description: Path to where octofin can store permanent data

name: jellyfin_server_url
description: URL of the jellyfin server as seen by octofin.

name: jellyfin_api_key
description: External applications are required to have an API key in order to communicate with the server. You can generate a key by going into admin dashboard > API Keys

name: use_cache
description: Allows the use of storing cache files for downloading and quick retrieval.
